nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in zonally periodic idealized estuary test case. Typical value is 50.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_depth_ocean
nml_option.description: Depth of the domain at the ocean side.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_depth_river
nml_option.description: Depth of the domain at the river side.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_initial_temperature
nml_option.description: Initial temperature for the entire domain.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_initial_salinity_ocean
nml_option.description: Initial salinity at the ocean side.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_initial_salinity_river
nml_option.description: Initial salinity at the river side.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_initial_salinity_width
nml_option.description: Width of the initial salinity gradient at the center of the domain.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_idealized_estuary_tidal_boundary_width
nml_option.description: Width of the tidal boundary at the ocean side.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.
